entry.title: WIND WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -3.7°C

Temperature: -3.7°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
